content:
Hello Simplifier users,
I intially had a project in Simplifier targeting STU3 and when I uploaded example files, there was a way to validate these samples against a profile. I had to change my project to DSTU2 and now I don't see the validate option any longer- is it something not available in DSTU2?
Thank you!
Priya
Hi Priya, currently Simplifier only does snapshot creation and Validation for STU3 resources.
We assumed DSTU2 would slowly go away. But since the US is more focused on DSTU2 than expected, we are considering building services for that too. Can't give you a promise though :)

Thank you for your response! Yes, after the Boston devDays, we came away with the decision to support DSTU2 instead of STU3, given that most of the major vendors are on DSTU2. Your STU3 features are awesome! Looking forward to any updates on DSTU2- good luck!
